Plot: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.
Title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
Writer: Jay Ward (based on the series produced by), Craig Wright (screenplay), Robert Ben Garant (additional dialogue), Thomas Lennon (additional dialogue), Ted Key (based upon the characters and format created by: "Sherman and Peabody"), Michael McCullers (additional screenplay material)
Actors: Ty Burrell, Max Charles, Lauri Fraser, Guillaume Aretos
